roleset.name: looking into the future, forecasting
roleset.note: PROSPECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. No VNcls. (from prospection.01-n)

role.descr: at what; subject matter of the forecast

example.name: arg 1
example.text: It seems that I have changed the subject ! I do n't know about the prospection of Shenzhen 's housing prices next year , everyone , when will you take action if the prices continue to go down ?
example.arg: of Shenzhen's housing prices next year

example.name: LVC
example.text: In addition to encapsulating the preceding text, a sentence can make a prospection about the next sentence, thus establishing a need for the next sentence to fulfil the prospection if coherence is to be maintained.

example.name: arg2
example.text: Other opinions are no more than their prospection that even IPv6 address might be exhausted.
example.arg: that even IPv6 address might be exhausted
